ai-patthana8.30:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.30:0.3_0: knocked with the ties, and associated with the knots,
ai-patthana8.30:1.1_0: (They do) not give rise to fragrances, and those with longing for the smells, and for the sake of (wholesome) went for the sake of) smells. The Teaching does not arise because of that.
ai-patthana8.30:1.1_1: He is not for the sake of fragrance, or for the sake of smells, and for the sake of (wholesome) go wandering, but there is no cause or reason for those without.
ai-patthana8.30:1.1_2: or to the fragrance, separations, and not for the sake of traveling, and for the sake of traveling. You don’t become indeed with cause and reasoned with cause and reasons.
ai-patthana8.30:2.1_0: One should not give rise to the secrets, and one is not dedicated to the smells. The Teaching is in the neighborhood of the knotted, and there is no cause or reason for these reasons.
ai-patthana8.30:2.1_1: One should not give rise to the smell, or for the smell, and for the taste of the Teaching, or for the Sangha, and for the purpose of walking.
ai-patthana8.30:2.1_2: They don’t neglect to profit, or both you’re not dedicated to the gods, and you don’t have the causes and you’re not dedicated to the have causes and reasons.
ai-patthana8.30:3.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to the fragrance, and he is not tied to it, and there is no cause or condition for the sake of traveling.
ai-patthana8.30:3.1_1: He doesn’t go to the neighborhood of the perfume, or with the knotted like a golden statue, ornamented for the neck, and there is no cause or reason for those without.
ai-patthana8.30:3.1_2: He doesn’t go to the neighborhood of the ties, or knot-free, and you’re not dedicated to the gods, and there are things for the sake of traveling.
ai-patthana8.30:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
